description: Vegan Shepherds Pie with Chickpeas and Sweet Potato mash. Crusted with breadcrumbs, garlic and herbs. 1 hour Easy Vegetarian Shepherd's Pie. Vegan Nut-free Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free
name: Vegan Shepherds Pie with Chickpeas & Sweet Potato
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp dried thyme ( or 2 tsp fresh)
1.5 to 2 cups veggies (-carrots, peppers, mushrooms, broccoli, celery, chopped)
black pepper and cayenne to taste (1/4 tsp or more)

recipeInstructions.text: Add sweet potatoes to a pot of water with salt. Bring to a boil and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender. Drain, mash, season with salt, pepper, olive oil, thyme and set aside. (I used pre-cubed sweet potatoes to save time and to save my thumb).

video.description:
Vegan Chickpea Sweet Potato Shepherd's Pie with Garlic Herb Crumb. 
RECIPE : http://www.veganricha.com/2016/10/vegan-shepherds-pie-chickpeas-sweet-potato.html

Vegan Shepherds Pie with Chickpeas and Sweet Potato mash. Savory Brothy Veggies and Chickpeas, mashed potatoes, Crusted with breadcrumbs, garlic and herbs! Use Lentils to make Lentil shepherds pie. 1 hour Vegetarian Shepherd’s Pie. Vegan Nut-free Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free. Great for Holidays, Thanksgiving or everyday.
